info.name: Whirlpool Watched Whreads - Bigger Links!
info.description:
Makes the clickable area of the links in the "unread" column on the Watched Threads page bigger.

There are a few different methods to choose from.
info.additionalInfo: Thread on Whirlpool Also should do the "replies" column on user pages and the "end" right triangle on the popular threads page.
